text:
Courtyard By Marriott Opens First Hotel In Colombia
Marriott International, announced the opening of the new 144-room Courtyard by Marriott Hotel in Bogota, known as Colombia’s largest financial, political, and cultural center, also known as one of the fastest growing metropolitan areas in South America. The hotel is located on the prestigious Avenida El Dorado, making it the closest hotel to the recently inaugurated new terminal at El Dorado International Airport, and is part of a mixed-use complex which includes prime office and retail space.
“Courtyard is expanding internationally at a rapid pace and we’re thrilled to introduce this innovative brand to Colombia,” said Tim Sheldon, President of the Caribbean & Latin America at Marriott International, Inc. “With the opening of the hotel in Bogota, Courtyard now has a presence in 42 countries around the world and we look forward to continuing to serve our guests as we enter many new countries in our region in the future.”
“The El Dorado Airport recently underwent a multi-million dollar renovation and is considered among the key hubs in Latin America, making the Courtyard by Marriott Bogota on Avenida El Dorado an excellent option for the modern regional business traveler,” said Sergio Ohliger, general manager of the hotel.
The hotel features the brand’s refreshing business lobby, lobby bar, the casual dining CENTRO restaurant, flexible meeting space and recreational facilities, including a swimming pool and sauna. Additionally, it includes the brand’s new modern guestroom design that helps guests stay connected, productive and comfortable. Thoughtfully planned, each guest room features plush bedding, a functional work space, spacious bathrooms, a separate seating area and complimentary in-room high-speed Internet.
Marriott International is currently represented in Colombia by the 264-room JW Marriott Hotel Bogota, the 239-room Bogota Marriott Hotel, the 170-room Cali Marriott Hotel and 64-room The Artisan D.C. Hotel from our Autograph Collection.
The Courtyard by Marriott brand features hotels with a refreshing environment that helps guests stay connected, productive and balanced while traveling. Intuitive services and design accommodate guests’ desire for choice and control and allow them to use the public space and guest rooms to meet all of their needs while on the road. With more than 1000 locations in 42 countries, Courtyard has more locations than any other Marriott International brand.
Source:- Marriott
